profile-main.p1: I'm a full-stack junior developper competent in both frontend and backend.
profile-main.p2: I worked on a wide variety of small scale projects and i am now looking for opportunities to work on professional projects to test and expand my skills.

services.description: The online certifications i passed made me competent with a wide variety of Javascript tools, but i'm also working on personnal projects on my free time to further develop my skills and knowledge.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: I'm interested in every opportunity, wether it's a small scale project or a more ambitious one necessiting working in a team, don't hesitate to contact me via Email or with the form on this page.

footer.p1: Made by Jérôme Gautier with SolidJs
